sql.isNotEmpty: u.PRD_RETURN_ID in (select a.PRD_RETURN_ID from ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NO) like upper('%'||#PRD_NO#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.PRD_RETURN_ID in (select a.PRD_RETURN_ID from ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NAME) like upper('%'||#PRD_NAME#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.PRD_RETURN_ID in (select a.PRD_RETURN_ID from ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_SPEC) like upper('%'||#PRD_SPEC#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)

sqlMap.sql: select u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.EXPECT_RETURNDATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') EXPECT_RETURNDATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_PRD_RETURN u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM ERP_PRD_RETURN u
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_PRD_RETURN( PRD_RETURN_ID, RECV_CHANN_ID, RETURN_CHANN_ID, FROM_BILL_ID, PRD_RETURN_NO, BILL_TYPE, FROM_BILL_NO, EXPECT_RETURNDATE, RETURN_CHANN_NO, RETURN_CHANN_NAME, RECV_CHANN_NO, RECV_CHANN_NAME, REMARK, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #PRD_RETURN_ID#, #RECV_CHANN_ID#, #RETURN_CHANN_ID#, #FROM_BILL_ID#, #PRD_RETURN_NO#, #BILL_TYPE#, #FROM_BILL_NO#, to_date(#EXPECT_RETURNDATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD'), #RETURN_CHANN_NO#, #RETURN_CHANN_NAME#, #RECV_CHANN_NO#, #RECV_CHANN_NAME#, #REMARK#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_PRD_RETURN
RECV_CHANN_ID = #RECV_CHANN_ID# AUDIT_ID = #AUDIT_ID# AUDIT_TIME =sysdate RETURN_CHANN_ID = #RETURN_CHANN_ID# AUDIT_NAME = #AUDIT_NAME# FROM_BILL_ID = #FROM_BILL_ID# PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID# PRD_RETURN_NO = #PRD_RETURN_NO# BILL_TYPE = #BILL_TYPE# FROM_BILL_NO = #FROM_BILL_NO# EXPECT_RETURNDATE =to_date(#EXPECT_RETURNDATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') RETURN_CHANN_NO = #RETURN_CHANN_NO# RETURN_CHANN_NAME = #RETURN_CHANN_NAME# RECV_CHANN_NO = #RECV_CHANN_NO# RECV_CHANN_NAME = #RECV_CHANN_NAME# REMARK = #REMARK# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE#
where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_PRD_RETURN set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.EXPECT_RETURNDATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') EXPECT_RETURNDATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_PRD_RETURN u where u.PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.RETURN_PRICE, u.RETURN_NUM, u.RETURN_AMOUNT, u.RETURN_RSON_TYPE, u.RETURN_RSON, u.RETURN_ATT, u.DUTY_DECIDE, u.PRICE_DECIDE, u.REAL_RETURN_AMOUNT, u.REMARK_DECIDE, u.DEAL_FACTORY_ID, u.DEAL_FACTORY_NAME, u.DECIDE_PSON_ID, u.DECIDE_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.DECIDE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DECIDE_TIME, u.DECIDE_FLAG, u.DEL_FLAG, u.SN, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG from ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on u.SPCL_TECH_ID=a.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL( PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID, PRD_RETURN_ID, DECIDE_TIME, PRD_ID, PRICE_DECIDE, DECIDE_PSON_NAME, DEAL_FACTORY_ID, DECIDE_FLAG, DUTY_DECIDE, REMARK_DECIDE, DEAL_FACTORY_NAME, REAL_RETURN_AMOUNT, FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, DECIDE_PSON_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, RETURN_PRICE, RETURN_NUM, RETURN_AMOUNT, RETURN_RSON_TYPE, RETURN_RSON, RETURN_ATT, DEL_FLAG )values( #PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID#, #PRD_RETURN_ID#, to_date(#DECIDE_TIME#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #PRD_ID#, #PRICE_DECIDE#, #DECIDE_PSON_NAME#, #DEAL_FACTORY_ID#, #DECIDE_FLAG#, #DUTY_DECIDE#, #REMARK_DECIDE#, #DEAL_FACTORY_NAME#, #REAL_RETURN_AMOUNT#, #FROM_BILL_DTL_ID#, #DECIDE_PSON_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #RETURN_PRICE#, #RETURN_NUM#, #RETURN_AMOUNT#, #RETURN_RSON_TYPE#, #RETURN_RSON#, #RETURN_ATT#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID in ($PRD_RETURN_DTL_IDS$)
update ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update ERP_PRD_RETURN set STATE = #STATE# where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID#
